https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ay4w0irgGphBmwd7OiD36OqPS51.jpg After failing her university entrance exam, Sakuko is invited by her aunt Mikie to spend summer vacation in a beautiful seaside town. Sakuko gets to know the people of the town, including Takashi, a shy relative of her childhood friend. Au revoir l'été
